sentences.en: A liquid crystal display and a fabricating method thereof are provided.
sentences.cn: 本发明提供了一种液晶显示器及其制造方法.

sentences.en: Economic policy should therefore be set once a country understands which group it belongs to and implications thereof.
sentences.cn: 因此，一旦某个荷兰经济学论文国家知道它属于哪个组，并影响其经济政策应。

sentences.en: Excess in drinking is the evil thereof.
sentences.cn: 饮酒过度由此而生祸害.

sentences.en: If no permission is granted , the reasons thereof shall be given.
sentences.cn: 不许可的, 应当说明理由.

sentences.en: If the oxide film is hard, sliding occurs on the outside thereof.
sentences.cn: 如果氧化膜较硬, 则滑动在它们的外面发生.

sentences.en: In support thereof, attached are the following mandatory requirements.
sentences.cn: 依此, 附件是以下所列的必需条件〈内容〉!

sentences.en: In was way did respect, or lack thereof, play a roll?
sentences.cn: 尊重的存在或缺失, 在此是否起到任何作用?

sentences.en: Losses caused as a result thereof shall be borne by the violator.
sentences.cn: 由此而造成的损失,由违反者承担.

sentences.en: Losses suffered by the mortgagee as a result thereof shall be compensated by the mortgagor.
sentences.cn: 承押人因此所受的损失由抵押人赔偿.

sentences.en: Money, or the lack thereof , played a major role in their marital problems.
sentences.cn: 钱，或者说没钱，是他们婚姻出现问题的主要原因。

sentences.en: Please take note thereof, and honour his draft on presentation.
sentences.cn: 惠请予以留意, 当他向贵行提示汇票时,予以承兑为荷.

sentences.en: States differ in standards for products and the labelling thereof.
sentences.cn: 各州的产品标准不同，标签的标注也不同。

sentences.en: The invention discloses a nutritious temperature - increase cutting substrate a preparation method thereof.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了一种营养增温 型 扦插基质及其配制方法,包括木屑、动物粪、黄土、生物结抗菌.

sentences.en: The invention discloses an organic field - effect transistor and a preparation method thereof.
sentences.cn: 本发明公开了有机场效应晶体管及其制备方法.

sentences.en: The lessee shall be liable for compensating the lessor for losses suffered as a result thereof.
sentences.cn: 出租人因此所受的损失由承租人负责赔偿.

sentences.en: Thereof, the author proposes some adjustment measures and methods for reference.
sentences.cn: 为此, 本文提出了一些调整的措施和方法,可借土建设计人员借鉴、参考.

sentences.en: Thethe invention also discloses a communication device and the system thereof.
sentences.cn: 本发明同时公开了一种通信装置和一种通信系统.

sentences.en: Wadding of man - made fibres and articles thereof , other than sanitary articles.
sentences.cn: 化学纤维制絮胎及其制品, 卫生用品除外.
